data.persona: I manage the castles finances.  I enjoy reading.  I am not good at using weapons.
data.description:
You are in the The Lagoon.
The Lagoon is a dark and mysterious place during the night hours.  A lot of moss and lily pads surround the shore.  The water is very murky.
There's a lily pad, a Lagoon, and a moss here.
The townsperson is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need something from the lagoon for my records.
data.mid_motivation: I need to keep accurate records of the land in the kingdom to ensure the financial records are entirely accurate.
data.long_motivation: I must keep the castle's finances accurate as possible so that the kingdom will not go bankrupt and the king can always be aware of his current financial standing.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: go murky water, where fish can be seen swimming beneath the surface

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: put Lagoon water on wooden bucket

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: put lagoon water on cabinet of physical artifacts of land
